Synopsis: Creates a new HTML section with scrolling functionality.
Description: This function creates a new HTML section with scrolling functionality. It takes a script block as input, executes the script block, and generates HTML output for each SectionScrollingItem.
Notes:
File Name      : New-HTMLSectionScrolling.ps1
Prerequisite   : This function requires Enable-HTMLFeature to be run with the SectionScrolling feature enabled.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
